Key Match Events: The Bulls won an overtime game against the Charlotte Hornets on the road
Pre-Game Insights: EVP of Basketball Operations Arturas Karnisovas didn't commit to a goal of making the Playoffs or keeping the top-10 protected draft pick
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls are not on pace to make the Playoffs nor to keep their top-10 protected pick
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls are 5-11 at home and 10-7 on the road
They haven't sold high on any of their veterans and their young players haven't taken meaningful steps forward
Others: The Bulls' -3.3 net rating indicates they are over-performing
Patrick Williams is still averaging 10 points per game
Coby White has shaken off a cold-shooting slump but hasn't taken a step forward to become the franchise cornerstone
